description: This file defines a team of agents with specific tools and models to gather information about a company, including setting up agents, a custom query, and executing a report generation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a name, role, model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with specific configurations and members.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: Model class for Mistral chat models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web searching via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: aprtint_response
methods.description: Method to generate and stream a report based on the team's gathered information.
